package.name: linux-amd64
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin:$PATH make ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- oldconfig if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin/amd64-linux-uclibc-gcc' pump make -j $jobcount ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- CC='distcc /usr/local/crosstools-amd64/bin/amd64-linux-uclibc-gcc' bzImage else make -j 4 ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- make -j 4 ARCH=x86_64 CROSS_COMPILE=amd64-linux-uclibc- bzImage fi
